ui_arc_label.h
==============

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`Graphic <graphic.md>`__

**Description:**

Defines the attributes of an arc label.

The attributes include the center and radius of an arc, angle range, and
text orientation.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------
